job_details.Functieomschrijving:
ING Analytics is a new unit responsible for realizing this vision for ING, differentiating ING as a leader in data-driven organizations, within the banking sector and beyond. The team consists of several Global Analytics Centre of Excellence around the bank's key capabilities (such as Pricing, Risk Management, Financial Crime, Customer Intelligence, and People Analytics.) as well as strong coordination areas around data management, technology, customer journey, UX, as well as external partnerships.

   COO Analytics tribe
   You will be part of the COO Analytics Tribe, which delivers generative AI, AI, and advanced analytics capabilities to all the countries in which ING operates. Specifically, you will help create innovative-scalable-data driven solutions in the space of Customer Due Diligence Analytics. You proactively work with teams to implement these solutions across the organization. You will work collaboratively with an extended group of stakeholders, including global and local Retail Contact Center teams.

   Your mission will be to ensure the improvement of our products with a team and supporting all ING countries in reaching their targets by providing smart advanced analytics solutions, to strengthen ING leadership in digitalization & support our 40 million customers.

   We work in a fun and creative environment, and we're dedicated to bringing out the best in both our relations and our projects, ranging from enhancing our virtual assistants in production via innovative NLP techniques such as Generative AI and Large Language Models to building speech analytics use cases across all the countries ING operates in.

   The opportunity
   As a cloud solution engineer, you will be partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts (CJE) to design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure for the use of leading-edge conversational AI products, such as a compliant generative AI chatbot. As a Cloud Engineer, you understand business needs, can architect GCP cloud solutions, understand data needs, and can inform on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize the conversational platform and thus increase ING contact center agents' efficiencies. You can with the GCP APIs and code pipelines to support the team's needs. You can productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production environments.

   You Will Be Responsible For:
     * Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies.
     * Advice on which Google Cloud Platform products to use.
     * Making cloud designs and technical decisions for conversational systems projects at ING Analytics.
     * Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow.
     * Implementing GCP native ML architectures.
     * Contributing to strengthening the cloud capability within the team.
     * Implementing Looker Dashboards, BigQuery datasets/views, and working with Vertex AI Search and Conversation API.
     * Writing code to interact with GCP API's.
     * Automation of team bottlenecks.
job_details.full_text:
Cloud Solution Engineer

ING Analytics is a new unit responsible for realizing this vision for ING, differentiating ING as a leader in data-driven organizations, within the banking sector and beyond. The team consists of several Global Analytics Centre of Excellence around the bank's key capabilities (such as Pricing, Risk Management, Financial Crime, Customer Intelligence, and People Analytics.) as well as strong coordination areas around data management, technology, customer journey, UX, as well as external partnerships.

   COO Analytics tribe
   You will be part of the COO Analytics Tribe, which delivers generative AI, AI, and advanced analytics capabilities to all the countries in which ING operates. Specifically, you will help create innovative-scalable-data driven solutions in the space of Customer Due Diligence Analytics. You proactively work with teams to implement these solutions across the organization. You will work collaboratively with an extended group of stakeholders, including global and local Retail Contact Center teams.

   Your mission will be to ensure the improvement of our products with a team and supporting all ING countries in reaching their targets by providing smart advanced analytics solutions, to strengthen ING leadership in digitalization & support our 40 million customers.

   We work in a fun and creative environment, and we're dedicated to bringing out the best in both our relations and our projects, ranging from enhancing our virtual assistants in production via innovative NLP techniques such as Generative AI and Large Language Models to building speech analytics use cases across all the countries ING operates in.

   The opportunity
   As a cloud solution engineer, you will be partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts (CJE) to design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure for the use of leading-edge conversational AI products, such as a compliant generative AI chatbot. As a Cloud Engineer, you understand business needs, can architect GCP cloud solutions, understand data needs, and can inform on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize the conversational platform and thus increase ING contact center agents' efficiencies. You can with the GCP APIs and code pipelines to support the team's needs. You can productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production environments.

   You Will Be Responsible For:
     * Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies.
     * Advice on which Google Cloud Platform products to use.
     * Making cloud designs and technical decisions for conversational systems projects at ING Analytics.
     * Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow.
     * Implementing GCP native ML architectures.
     * Contributing to strengthening the cloud capability within the team.
     * Implementing Looker Dashboards, BigQuery datasets/views, and working with Vertex AI Search and Conversation API.
     * Writing code to interact with GCP API's.
     * Automation of team bottlenecks.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and deployment of applications using Generative AI and Large Language Models (LLMs), including building compliant generative AI chatbots and enhancing virtual assistants with NLP techniques. It explicitly mentions working with conversational AI products, Google Cloud Native infrastructure, GCP APIs, Vertex AI Search and Conversation API, and operationalizing cloud-native applications. This aligns directly with the core responsibilities and evidence profile of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building user-facing systems powered by generative models.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding business needs to design and implement solutions that increase ING contact center agents' efficiencies and support 40 million customers, aligning technical solutions with business goals.
The role aims to improve products and help countries reach targets by providing advanced analytics solutions, demonstrating an understanding of business objectives.
job_tasks.phrase: ensure the improvement of our products with a team and supporting all ING countries in reaching their targets by providing smart advanced analytics solutions

job_tasks.justification: The role involves creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow, which is a component of data flow and processing for conversational AI.
job_tasks.phrase: Creating data pipelines that interact with DialogFlow

job_tasks.justification: The role explicitly mentions working with Generative AI and LLM technologies for implementation and productionalization, and implementing GCP native ML architectures.
job_tasks.phrase: Implementation and productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies

job_tasks.justification: The role involves implementing GCP native ML architectures, which is a core aspect of building and deploying machine learning models.
The role involves working with Vertex AI Search and Conversation API, which are tools for building and deploying generative AI models and conversational agents.
job_tasks.phrase: working with Vertex AI Search and Conversation API

job_tasks.justification: The role requires designing and implementing Google Cloud Native infrastructure for conversational AI products and operationalizing cloud-native applications for production environments.
job_tasks.phrase: design and implement Google Cloud Native infrastructure for the use of leading-edge conversational AI products

job_tasks.justification: The role involves writing code to interact with GCP APIs, which is a fundamental software development task for integrating services.
job_tasks.phrase: Writing code to interact with GCP API's

job_tasks.justification: The role requires productizing and operationalizing cloud-native applications for production environments.
job_tasks.phrase: productize and operationalize (GCP) cloud-native applications for production environments

job_tasks.justification: The role focuses on productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies, and operationalizing cloud-native applications, which are key MLOps activities.
job_tasks.phrase: productionalization of cloud solutions using Generative AI and LLM technologies

job_tasks.justification: The role involves automating team bottlenecks, which is a common practice in MLOps to improve efficiency and reliability of systems.

The role requires making technical decisions for conversational systems projects and strengthening cloud capability within the team, which relates to the operational management and scaling of AI systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Making cloud designs and technical decisions for conversational systems projects at ING Analytics

partnering with Data Analysts and Customer Journey Experts (CJE)
strengthening the cloud capability within the team
inform on using the right cloud solutions to operationalize the conversational platform
proactively work with teams to implement these solutions across the organization
